mapper.insert: insert into block(`name`, `enterprise_id`, `create_time`, `update_time`, `operator_id`, `detail`) values(#{name}, #{enterpriseId}, now(), now(), #{operatorId}, #{detail})
mapper.select:
select id, name from block where delete_flg=0
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId}
order by id
mapper.update: update block set delete_flg=1 where id=#{id}
